Pet Manager Lundy:
Pets are precious followers and friends for adventurers. Any adventurer who has spent a night out in the wilderness, comforted and protected by his pet, knows exactly what I mean!
Listen to instructions about how to raise a pet.
Purchase pet items.
Exchange pet equipment for higher-grade one.
Exchange the hatchling equipment with the strider equipment.
Evolve pet.
Exchange the pet trade ticket with a pet.
Sell your items.
See the lord and get the tax rate information.
